main event: An object was sighted in Shelton, Connecticut, on 10 August 1959, with multiple witnesses observing it.
interesting points: The object was observed for 3-4 minutes,It changed color to bright orange-red after passing overhead,Insufficient information was available for thorough analysis,The sighting was reported by 6 individuals,There was a follow-up request for further data that was not returned.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object that changed color
